title: Agent Carter Recruits Kurtwood Smith for Recurring Season 2 Role
text:
Agent Carter Recruits Kurtwood Smith for Recurring Season 2 Role 
Published By: TVLine.com - Today 
That ’70s dad is joining that ’40s show. Kurtwood Smith has booked a recurring role on Season 2 of ABC’s Marvel’s Agent Carter, as V...
